min: 0

max: 1

type: Reference

max: 1

documentation: The partially (or fully)-populated set of answers for the specified Questionnaire

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: Marks this as a profile of the base

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Name used to invoke the operation

parameters.name: context-type
parameters.description: A type of use context assigned to the operation definition

parameters.name: context-type-quantity
parameters.description: A use context type and quantity- or range-based value assigned to the operation definition

parameters.name: context-type-value
parameters.description: A use context type and value assigned to the operation definition

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The operation definition publication date

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the operation definition

parameters.name: input-profile
parameters.description: Validation information for in parameters

parameters.name: instance
parameters.description: Invoke on an instance?

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Intended jurisdiction for the operation definition

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: operation | query

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Computationally friendly name of the operation definition

parameters.name: output-profile
parameters.description: Validation information for out parameters

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Name of the publisher of the operation definition

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the operation definition

parameters.name: system
parameters.description: Invoke at the system level?

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The human-friendly name of the operation definition

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Invoke at the type level?

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The uri that identifies the operation definition

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The business version of the operation definition
